Sentencas: A tubular anode-supported micro-solid oxide fuel cell (mu SOFC) has been developed for producing high volumetric power density (VPD) SOFC systems featuring rapid turn on/off capability.
Titulo: Anode-supported tubular micro-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An electrophoretic deposition (EPD)-based, facile manufacturing process is being refined to produce the anode support, anode functional and electrolyte layers of a single cell.
Titulo: Anode-supported tubular micro-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: mu SOFCs (diameter < 5 mm) have two main potential advantages, a substantial increase in the electrolyte surface area per unit volume of a stack and also rapid start-up.
Titulo: Anode-supported tubular micro-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: As fuel cell power is directly proportional to the active electrolyte surface area, a mu SOFC stack can substantially increase the VPD of an SOFC device.
Titulo: Anode-supported tubular micro-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A decrease in tube diameter allows for a reduction in wall thickness without any degradation of a cell's mechanical properties.
Titulo: Anode-supported tubular micro-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Owing to its thin wall, a mu SOFC has an extremely high thermal shock resistance and low thermal mass.
Titulo: Anode-supported tubular micro-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: These two characteristics are fundamental in reducing start-up and turn-off time for the SOFC stack.
Titulo: Anode-supported tubular micro-solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Traditionally, SOFC has not been considered for portable applications due to its high thermal mass and low thermal shock resistance (start-up time in hours), but with mu SOFCs' potential for rapid start-up, new possibilities for portable and transportable applications open up.
Titulo: Anode-supported tubular micro-solid oxide fuel cell
